titleStmt.title: The arraignment and plea of Edw. Fitz-Harris, Esq. with all the arguments in law, and proceedings of the Court of Kings-Bench thereupon, in Easter term, 1681.
titleStmt.author: Fitzharris, Edward, 1648?-1681, defendant.
England and Wales. Court of King's Bench.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Fr. Tyton ... and Tho. Basset ...,

notesStmt.note: Fitzharris was accused of high treason.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
